title: Comets Brought Water To Earth Billions Of Years Ago, New Study Claims
content: The water on Earth has a unique molecular signature which has to do with specific rations of the hydrogen variant, or isotope, called deuterium.
summary: The water on Earth has a unique molecular signature which has to do with specific rations of the hydrogen variant, or isotope, called deuterium.

title: Indian Student Stabbed To Death In Canada, Housemate Arrested
content: A 22-year-old Indian student was fatally stabbed in Canada's Ontario by his housemate, who has been charged with second-degree murder by the Sarnia Police.
summary: A 22-year-old Indian student was fatally stabbed in Canada's Ontario by his housemate, who has been charged with second-degree murder by the Sarnia Police.

title: From Joan Of Arc To Wine Cellar: Notre Dame In Five Dates
content: As Notre Dame cathedral prepares to reopen its doors for the first time since a devastating fire in 2019, a look back at five key dates in the Paris landmark's colourful history.
summary: As Notre Dame cathedral prepares to reopen its doors for the first time since a devastating fire in 2019, a look back at five key dates in the Paris landmark's colourful history.

title: Notre Dame Reopens Five Years After Shocking Blaze
content: Notre Dame will formally reopen five years after the Paris cathedral was devastated by fire, with US president-elect Donald Trump among world leaders there to celebrate its remarkably rapid restoration.
summary: Notre Dame will formally reopen five years after the Paris cathedral was devastated by fire, with US president-elect Donald Trump among world leaders there to celebrate its remarkably rapid restoration.

title: Insurance Exec Killer Fled On Foot, Then Took Cycle; Likely Not In New York
content: New York police said they believe the man suspected of gunning down a top health insurance executive may have fled the city on a bus following the brazen daylight murder.
summary: New York police said they believe the man suspected of gunning down a top health insurance executive may have fled the city on a bus following the brazen daylight murder.

title: Syria Government Loses Control Of Key City Daraa
content: Syrian government forces have lost control of Daraa city, a war monitor said, in another stunning blow for President Bashar al-Assad's rule after rebels wrested other key cities from his grip.
summary: Syrian government forces have lost control of Daraa city, a war monitor said, in another stunning blow for President Bashar al-Assad's rule after rebels wrested other key cities from his grip.

title: South Korea President Apologises But Doesn't Resign Over Martial Law Fiasco
content: South Korea's embattled President Yoon Suk Yeol apologised but stopped short of resigning Saturday over his declaration of martial law, with a vote to impeach him hours away and mass street protests planned in Seoul.
summary: South Korea's embattled President Yoon Suk Yeol apologised but stopped short of resigning Saturday over his declaration of martial law, with a vote to impeach him hours away and mass street protests planned in Seoul.

title: This Teen Earns Rs 16 Lakh A Month Selling Stickers Online. Here's How
content: A 17-year-old British teenager, Caelan McDonald, is earning $19,000 (₹16,08,748) monthly by selling personalised stickers.
summary: A 17-year-old British teenager, Caelan McDonald, is earning $19,000 (₹16,08,748) monthly by selling personalised stickers.

title: Video: Woman Plunges Into Electrical Box During Sidewalk Blast In Peru
content: An underground electrical box explosion in Lima injured a woman, with authorities suspecting cable maintenance issues. The victim, rescued by a military officer, is in stable condition, while the energy company denied involvement.
summary: An underground electrical box explosion in Lima injured a woman, with authorities suspecting cable maintenance issues. The victim, rescued by a military officer, is in stable condition, while the energy company denied involvement.

title: Vulture's Corpse Hangs In Front Of Pilot After Crashing Into Cockpit Mid-Air
content: Despite the high-intensity impact, the pilot managed to hold his own and landed the aircraft at the Eirunepe airport without any trouble.
summary: Despite the high-intensity impact, the pilot managed to hold his own and landed the aircraft at the Eirunepe airport without any trouble.

title: 'America's Got Talent' Comedian Kabir 'Kabeezy' Singh Dies At 39
content: Comedian Kabir "Kabeezy" Singh, best known for his performance as a semi-finalist on 'America's Got Talent', has died at the age of 39.
summary: Comedian Kabir "Kabeezy" Singh, best known for his performance as a semi-finalist on 'America's Got Talent', has died at the age of 39.

title: Parents Awarded Rs 2,600 Crore After Son Falls To Death At Orlando Park Ride
content: The Missouri teen plummeted to his death after slipping out of the seat on the 400 ft-tall ride at Orlando's ICON Park in 2022.
summary: The Missouri teen plummeted to his death after slipping out of the seat on the 400 ft-tall ride at Orlando's ICON Park in 2022.

title: South Korea President Yoon To Address Nation Ahead Of Impeachment Vote
content: South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol will address the nation on Saturday morning, his office said, ahead of a planned impeachment vote over his attempt this week to impose martial law.
summary: South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol will address the nation on Saturday morning, his office said, ahead of a planned impeachment vote over his attempt this week to impose martial law.

title: Over 2,80,000 Displaced In Northwest Syria Amid Rebel Offensive: UN
content: More than 2,80,000 people have been uprooted in northwest Syria following the sudden and massive offensive into Government-controlled areas led by Hayat Tahrir al-Sham (HTS), which is sanctioned by the Security Council as a terrorist group, the Unit

title: Foreign Secretary Vikram Misri To Visit Bangladesh Amid Strain In Ties
content: India has announced that Foreign Secretary Vikram Misri will travel to Bangladesh on Monday, a visit that comes amid increasing strain in ties between New Delhi and Dhaka over attacks on minorities, including Hindus, in the neighbouring country.
summary: India has announced that Foreign Secretary Vikram Misri will travel to Bangladesh on Monday, a visit that comes amid increasing strain in ties between New Delhi and Dhaka over attacks on minorities, including Hindus, in the neighbouring country.

title: "Leave At The Earliest": India's Midnight Advisory Over Situation In Syria
content: Concerned about the deteriorating situation in Syria, the Government of India put out a late-night advisory to all Indian nationals to completely "avoid all travel to Syria until further notice".
summary: Concerned about the deteriorating situation in Syria, the Government of India put out a late-night advisory to all Indian nationals to completely "avoid all travel to Syria until further notice".

title: Elon Musk Spent $270 Million To Help Donald Trump Win US Presidency
content: Tech billionaire Elon Musk spent at least $270 million to help Donald Trump win the US presidency, according to new federal filings, making him the country's biggest political donor.
summary: Tech billionaire Elon Musk spent at least $270 million to help Donald Trump win the US presidency, according to new federal filings, making him the country's biggest political donor.

title: Gaza Civil Defence Says Israeli Strike Kills 17 People
content: Gaza's civil defence agency said that 17 people were killed in an Israeli strike on Friday on a house in the Nuseirat refugee camp in central Gaza.
summary: Gaza's civil defence agency said that 17 people were killed in an Israeli strike on Friday on a house in the Nuseirat refugee camp in central Gaza.

title: Elon Musk Spent Over A Quarter Billion Dollars To Help Elect Donald Trump
content: Elon Musk spent over a quarter of a billion dollars to help Donald Trump win November's presidential election, according to new filings, underscoring the influence one of the world's wealthiest people had on this year's White House race.
summary: Elon Musk spent over a quarter of a billion dollars to help Donald Trump win November's presidential election, according to new filings, underscoring the influence one of the world's wealthiest people had on this year's White House race.
